fine_art_prints.description: Museum-quality photographic prints on archival paper

canvas_art.name: Gallery Canvas
canvas_art.description: Gallery-wrapped canvas prints ready to hang

metal_prints.description: Contemporary aluminum dibond prints with stunning clarity

acrylic_prints.name: Acrylic Prints
acrylic_prints.description: Face-mounted acrylic for extraordinary depth and luminosity

coffee_table_books.name: Coffee Table Books
coffee_table_books.description: Premium bound collections showcasing signature work

digital_products.name: Digital Products
digital_products.description: Lightroom presets, tutorials, and educational content

accessories.name: Premium Accessories
accessories.description: Curated lifestyle accessories for the discerning creative

urban_poetry.name: Urban Poetry
urban_poetry.description: Architectural studies and city landscapes that reveal hidden beauty in concrete jungles
urban_poetry.story: Shot during early morning hours across major metropolitan areas, this collection captures the quiet moments when cities reveal their true character.

human_connection.name: Human Connection
human_connection.description: Intimate portraits celebrating the depth of human emotion and relationship
human_connection.story: Each portrait in this series was created through genuine collaboration, revealing authentic moments of vulnerability and strength.

natural_wonder.name: Natural Wonder
natural_wonder.description: Landscapes showcasing the raw power and delicate beauty of the natural world
natural_wonder.story: From coastal cliffs to mountain peaks, these images celebrate Earth's extraordinary diversity.

studio_experiments.name: Studio Experiments
studio_experiments.description: Innovative studio work blending traditional photography with digital artistry
studio_experiments.story: Where technical precision meets artistic vision, pushing the boundaries of photographic possibility.

products.name: Golden Hour Manhattan
products.description: A breathtaking capture of Manhattan's skyline bathed in golden light, showcasing the interplay between architectural grandeur and natural beauty. Printed on Hahnemühle Photo Rag 308gsm, this museum-quality archival print reveals extraordinary detail and tonal range.
products.longDescription: This iconic image was captured during a rare moment when atmospheric conditions created perfect golden hour lighting across Manhattan. The photograph showcases the technical excellence and artistic vision that defines Brandon Mills' work—every building edge is razor-sharp, while the overall composition maintains a dreamlike quality. Printed using pigment inks on 100% cotton rag paper, this piece is designed to last generations without fading.
features: Printed to order in premium facilities
Ships carefully rolled in protective tube

products.name: Coastal Serenity
products.description: Waves crash against ancient rocks in this meditation on the timeless power of the ocean. Long exposure technique creates ethereal movement while maintaining crystal clarity in the foreground details.
products.longDescription: Captured during pre-dawn hours on the Pacific Coast, this image required precise timing and technical expertise. The 30-second exposure smooths the ocean into silk while keeping the rocky foreground sharp and detailed. The result is a contemplative piece that brings the calming energy of the coast into any space.

products.name: Reflections in Steel - Limited Edition 1/15
products.description: An experimental studio piece exploring light, reflection, and geometric precision. This limited edition of only 15 prints showcases the intersection of photography and digital art, creating something entirely unique.
products.longDescription: Created through a meticulous process combining in-camera capture with precise digital manipulation, this piece represents the cutting edge of contemporary photographic art. Each of the 15 prints in this edition is hand-signed, numbered, and accompanied by a detailed certificate of authenticity describing the creative process. This is investment-grade art designed for serious collectors.

products.name: Urban Poetry #7 - Gallery Canvas
products.description: Museum-quality canvas print gallery-wrapped on 1.5-inch stretcher bars. This piece arrives ready to hang, bringing sophisticated urban elegance to any space.
products.longDescription: Printed on premium canvas using archival inks, this gallery-wrapped piece features mirrored edges for a seamless look. The 1.5-inch depth creates a substantial presence on the wall, while the canvas texture adds warmth and dimension to the image. Each canvas is carefully hand-stretched and inspected for quality before shipping.
features: Ready to hang - no framing needed

products.name: Minimalist Architecture - Metal Print
products.description: Printed on brushed aluminum dibond, this contemporary piece offers unparalleled sharpness and a sleek, modern aesthetic. The metal surface creates incredible depth and luminosity.
products.longDescription: Metal prints represent the pinnacle of modern photographic reproduction. Printed directly onto aluminum dibond using a heat sublimation process, the colors are vivid, the blacks are deep, and the overall clarity is stunning. The brushed metal finish adds a subtle texture that changes with viewing angle, creating a dynamic viewing experience. Perfect for contemporary spaces.

products.name: Portrait Study #3 - Acrylic Face Mount
products.description: Face-mounted on premium acrylic for extraordinary depth and luminosity. This luxury presentation creates a window-like quality that draws viewers into the image.
products.longDescription: Acrylic face mounting is the premium choice for gallery presentations. The print is mounted behind 1/4-inch clear acrylic, creating incredible depth and protecting the image from UV damage and environmental factors. Colors appear to glow from within, and the overall effect is mesmerizing. The piece floats 1 inch off the wall using stainless steel standoffs, creating dramatic shadows and presence.

products.name: Sunset Boulevard - Museum Frame
products.description: A complete ready-to-hang solution featuring museum-quality archival matting and a handcrafted frame. This turnkey presentation is perfect for those who demand the finest.
products.longDescription: Our framed prints combine the finest archival materials with expert craftsmanship. Each piece features a museum-quality print on Hahnemühle paper, surrounded by 4-ply acid-free matting, and enclosed in a handcrafted frame with UV-protective glazing. The result is a gallery-ready piece that will be treasured for generations.

products.name: Urban Poetry: A Photographic Journey - Collector's Edition
products.description: A stunning 120-page hardcover book showcasing the complete Urban Poetry collection. Printed on premium heavyweight paper with a linen-bound cover, this is a work of art in itself.
products.longDescription: This collector's edition coffee table book presents 80 images from the Urban Poetry series, accompanied by essays exploring the creative process and philosophy behind the work. Each book is individually numbered and includes a tipped-in signed print. The premium production values—from the heavyweight paper to the linen binding—make this a treasured addition to any photography collection.

products.name: Portfolio: Collected Works 2020-2025 - Leather Bound
products.description: The ultimate collector's item: a comprehensive survey of Brandon Mills' photography from 2020-2025. Bound in full-grain leather with gilt edges, limited to 100 copies worldwide.
products.longDescription: This extraordinary volume represents five years of photographic exploration across multiple genres and styles. With 200 pages of carefully curated images, extended essays, and behind-the-scenes insights, this is the definitive collection. Each of the 100 copies is bound in full-grain leather, numbered and signed by the artist, and comes with an exclusive limited edition print not available elsewhere.

materials.binding: Full-grain leather binding with gold foil

products.name: Signature Lightroom Presets - Complete Collection
products.description: Professional-grade Lightroom presets developed over years of commercial and editorial work. 50+ presets covering every style from dramatic landscapes to subtle portraits.
products.longDescription: These presets represent thousands of hours of workflow refinement. Each preset is carefully crafted to enhance images while maintaining natural tonality and color relationships. Whether you shoot portraits, landscapes, street photography, or commercial work, these presets will accelerate your editing workflow while maintaining the highest quality standards. Includes video tutorials and before/after examples.
includes: PDF guide to using presets effectively

products.name: Mastering Light: Complete Photography Course
products.description: A comprehensive online course covering everything from camera fundamentals to advanced lighting techniques. 40+ hours of premium video content, assignments, and personalized feedback.
products.longDescription: This is the course I wish I had when starting photography. Over 40 hours of detailed video instruction covering technical fundamentals, creative vision, lighting mastery, post-processing, and building a sustainable photography business. Includes lifetime access to all content, future updates, assignments with personalized feedback, and access to a private community of serious photographers.

products.name: 1-on-1 Photography Mentorship Session
products.description: Personalized 90-minute video mentorship session covering your specific questions, portfolio review, and actionable next steps for your photography journey.
products.longDescription: Sometimes you need personalized guidance tailored to your specific situation. These one-on-one sessions provide focused attention on your work, challenges, and goals. Whether you need portfolio review, technical help, creative direction, or business advice, we'll create a customized session that delivers maximum value. Sessions are conducted via video call and include detailed follow-up notes and action items.

products.name: Signature Series T-Shirt - Urban Poetry
products.description: Premium 100% organic cotton t-shirt featuring a striking image from the Urban Poetry collection. Museum-quality printing on luxury fabric.
products.longDescription: This isn't your standard photographer merchandise. We've partnered with premium manufacturers to create apparel that matches our photographic standards. Each shirt features a carefully selected image printed using advanced techniques that preserve detail and color accuracy. The organic cotton is incredibly soft, sustainably sourced, and built to last.

products.name: Premium Hoodie - Reflections Collection
products.description: Luxury heavyweight hoodie featuring abstract imagery from the Studio Experiments series. Ultra-soft French terry interior with detailed embroidery.
products.longDescription: Elevate your casual wear with this exceptional hoodie. Made from premium heavyweight cotton with a French terry interior, it's incredibly comfortable while maintaining a refined aesthetic. The front features a subtle embroidered logo, while the back showcases a striking image from the Reflections series. This is luxury streetwear for the discerning creative.

products.name: Leather Tote Bag - Photographer's Essential
products.description: Handcrafted full-grain leather tote designed for the working creative. Spacious interior with padded laptop sleeve and camera compartment.
products.longDescription: Designed in collaboration with master leather craftspeople, this tote combines timeless aesthetics with modern functionality. The full-grain leather develops a beautiful patina over time, while the practical interior organization keeps your essential gear secure and accessible. Perfect for photographers, designers, and anyone who appreciates quality craftsmanship.

products.name: Premium Phone Case - Signature Series
products.description: Slim profile phone case featuring a museum-quality reproduction of selected work. Anti-scratch coating and raised edges protect your device in style.
products.longDescription: Carry art in your pocket with these premium phone cases. Each features a high-resolution reproduction of signature photography, protected by an anti-scratch coating. The slim profile maintains the elegant lines of your phone while providing essential protection. Wireless charging compatible.
features: Raised edges protect screen and camera

products.name: Art Print Postcard Set - Collector's Edition
products.description: Beautifully printed set of 20 postcards featuring signature images. Perfect for correspondence, framing, or collecting.
products.longDescription: These aren't ordinary postcards. Printed on premium cardstock with museum-quality reproduction, each card is a miniature work of art. The set includes 20 different images spanning multiple collections, packaged in a custom presentation box. Use them for correspondence, frame them for mini gallery walls, or keep them as collectibles.

entry.description: Accessible luxury - high quality at approachable price points

mid.description: Core collection - museum-quality products for serious collectors

luxury.description: Exclusive offerings - for discerning collectors and commercial clients

qualityPromise.guarantee: 30-day satisfaction guarantee on all products. If you're not completely delighted, return for full refund.
qualityPromise.sustainability: We're committed to minimizing environmental impact through made-to-order production, sustainable materials, and carbon-neutral shipping options.
qualityPromise.giving: 10% of limited edition proceeds support emerging photographers and arts education programs.
